name: Uncontrolable Hell Fight
description:
Uncontrolable Hell Fight is the game where two boxers fight until death, a very horrenodus death, at hell in front of a cute demon crowd cheering you both up.

The gameplay its pretty simple, you hit play, then you start the fight and every certain amount of time your hitting button control changes. Easy right?

This game was made by:

Mr.  Alex Balastegui

Mr. Samuel Balsells

Mr. Arturo Díez

Mr. Adrià Fret

We hope you enjoy the game and please, feel free to give us feedback and share with your friends!
